mapper.select: SELECT t.GID, t.GNAME, u.NNAME, t.HTAG, t.REGDATE, DATE_FORMAT(t.DUEDATE,'%Y-%m-%d') as DUEDATE FROM TEAM t JOIN G_MEMBER gm ON t.GID = gm.GID JOIN USER u ON gm.UID = u.UID WHERE t.HTAG IS NOT NULL AND gm.GRID = 1
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TEAM WHERE GID = #{gid} AND HTAG IS NOT NULL
mapper.select: select GID, GNAME, HTAG, REGDATE, DUEDATE from TEAM
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TEAM(GNAME, REGDATE) VALUES(#{gname}, sysdate())
mapper.update: update TEAM set HTAG = #{htag}, DUEDATE = sysdate() where gid = #{gid}
